General.Name: FullSix S.p.A
General.Description: Beewize S.p.A. operates a network of companies in digital innovation. Its network of companies chooses to systematize strategic and technological skills to simplify processes and improve experiences in the retail sector. The company was formerly known as FullSix S.p.A. and changed its name to Beewize S.p.A. in January 2023. Beewize S.p.A. was founded in 1988 and is based in Milano, Italy.
